pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, January 7, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a private virtual commemoration event for the families of the victims of Ukraine International Airlines Flight 752, marking the first anniversary of the tragedy. Minister of Foreign Affairs François-Philippe Champagne, Minister of Transport Marc Garneau, Parliamentary Secretary to the Prime Minister and to the Deputy Prime Minister and the Minister of Intergovernmental Affairs Omar Alghabra, and Special Advisor to the Prime Minister Ralph Goodale will be in attendance.  

Closed to media.

Media appearance

10:05 a.m.  An interview with the Prime Minister will air on Mountain FM Squamish/Whistler.
